reviewText: My fault - I failed to notice this does not have English subtitles.  I knew the DVD is PAL, which is OK as I have a PAL player that works on my USA TV.  For this DVD to work for you, you need a PAL player AND you need to understand German.
Old comedy movie for region 2 dvd player
A wonderful old German movie from.
saw it when it first came out, saw it now. It is still as funny.
This is a movie I saw at the theatre in my youth and wanted to see again.  It  is funny.

For Germans, this is like "It's a Wonderful Life," "Casablanca," and "Citizen Kane" all rolled into one. The lines from this film even 66 years later function as common proverbs. A it's centeris the story of a writer (with a doctorate and a literature prize) who goes back to the gymnasium (the high school for university bound students) and enrolls in the final year. While the story may be familiar to you and not that interesting, the teachers in this film are wonderful quirky characters and the tricks the students play on them are classics.
Awesome movie. I saw it as a child in Germany. I wish Amazon would sell more foreign DVD's...Die Feuerzangenbowle [Region 2]
